name: Reality Detector
description:
I made this cute platformer game for Brackeys game jam and the theme was "it is not real" , so be beware for what is real and what is not!

the flashlight show the real world but be careful when using it because it may ran out of battery.

Credits:

art

https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/pirate-bomb

music
